name: Counter-Propaganda Strategies
description: Tactics to counteract and neutralize psychological influence campaigns in media and warfare.

cards.title: Disrupting Controlled Narratives
cards.description: Techniques for interrupting and dismantling coordinated disinformation campaigns.
cards.bulletpoints: Utilize strategic questioning, cognitive disruption techniques, and counter-framing methodologies

cards.title: Reverse Persuasion Tactics
cards.description: Turning persuasive psychological tactics against their originators.
cards.bulletpoints: Leverage counter-messaging, rhetorical judo, and mirroring deception strategies
